title: Polish banks ranked by brand value in 2015
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 5 number of Banking Institutions.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 1594.0 is found at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and the minimum is found at Millennium where Banking Institution is 295.0.
The highest Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski has 1299.0 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Banking Institution Millennium.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 5 number of Banking Institutions.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 5 number of Banking Institutions.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 1594.0 is found at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and the minimum is found at Millennium where Banking Institution is 295.0.
The highest Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski has 1299.0 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Banking Institution Millennium.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Banking Institution in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 1594.0 is found at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and the minimum is found at Millennium where Banking Institution is 295.0.
Banking Institution Bank Pekao has the second highest value for Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Banking Institution is 1299.0.

Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski is higher than any other Banking Institutions with value 1594.0, followed by Bank Pekao, and Bank Zachodni WBK. Down to Banking Institution Millennium with the lowest value 295.0.
The Banking Institution Millennium tends to be 1.95 percent lower than average.
